data.value: Occurs when the value of the CategoryName property changes.

data.value: Determines the name of the counter category for this counter.

data.name: CheckFileNameException
data.value: The separator must not contain the following characters: {0} {1}

data.name: CounterCategory
data.value: Counter

data.name: CounterExistException
data.value: Specified counter doesn't exist.

data.name: CounterFormatChangedDescription
data.value: Occurs when the value of the CounterFormat property changes.

data.name: CounterFormatDescription
data.value: Determines the format for the counter, i.e. "%".

data.value: Occurs when the value of the CounterName property changes.

data.name: CounterNameDescription
data.value: Determines the name of the counter.

data.name: CounterStepDescription
data.value: Determines the step of the counter.

data.name: CounterStepException
data.value: Step cannot be lesser than 1.

data.name: DigitsChangedDescription
data.value: Occurs when the value of the Digits property changes.

data.name: DigitsDescription
data.value: Determines the number of digits in the postfix.

data.name: DigitsException
data.value: The number of digits cannot be lesser than 1.

data.name: EatLineChangedDescription
data.value: Occurs when the value of the EatLine property changes.

data.name: EatLineDescription
data.value: If true replaces the tail symbols which cannot be dispalyed with \"...\". Takes affect only if the WordWrap property is false.

data.name: ExtraPerformanceChangedDescription
data.value: Occurs when the value of the ExtraPerformance property changes.

data.name: ExtraPerformanceDescription
data.value: Indicates whether to use native GDI for rendering.

data.name: StretchImageDescription
